alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 17 at 3:10AM CST until January 19 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 80 mph possible during the day on Thursday. Winds will likely diminish for a few hours late Thursday evening, but then increase early Friday morning from the northeast. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains
